authors.bio: Super villain in somebody's action hero movie. Experienced a radioactive freak accident at a young age, which rendered him part-snake and strangely adept at Python.

ghostPost.plaintext:
Stuck on a visualization?  Try this data visualization checklist!  Also has a
tool for scoring stuff according to its method.  I don't think ya should totally
enslave yourself to methods like this, but it can be useful
https://datavizchecklist.stephanieevergreen.com/

The first rule of Good Documentation is...you do not talk about Good
Documentation
https://www.oreilly.com/ideas/the-eight-rules-of-good-documentation

Yay maffs, yay amateurs
https://www.quantamagazine.org/decades-old-graph-problem-yields-to-amateur-mathematician-20180417/
ghostPost.html:
Stuck on a visualization?  Try this data visualization checklist!  Also has a tool for scoring stuff according to its method.  I don't think ya should totally enslave yourself to methods like this, but it can be useful
https://datavizchecklist.stephanieevergreen.com/

The first rule of Good Documentation is...you do not talk about Good Documentation
https://www.oreilly.com/ideas/the-eight-rules-of-good-documentation

Yay maffs, yay amateurs
